title: Khloe Kardashian speaks with ex Lamar Odom for first time since his overdose
text:

Reality star Khloe Kardashian has been in contact with ex-husband Lamar Odom for the first time since his overdose back in 2015.

Khloe admitted to being "nervous" after she heard that the NBA legend was writing a book, Darkness to Light, which gives an insight into their failed marriage and his drug and alcohol addictions.

It includes a near death experience in 2015, when Lamar was hospitalised after some hard-partying in a Nevada brothel.

Khloe said of their relationship: "We had a really great marriage, but Lamar was battling some inner demons, so we had to divorce.

"After I got him on his feet, I felt it was better that we went different ways to not confuse our personal healing and growth."

(Image: KUWTK)

(Image: KUWTK)

The 35 year-old also watched her ex-hubby's interview on Good Morning America, in which Lamar admitted being dumbfounded by how badly he'd treated Khloe during their short marriage.

She was also happy to hear him say that he felt he owed her, and her family, an apology for the way he had behaved.

The book also delves into the plan by Kardashian matriarch Kris Jenner to get Khloe and Lamar to confront each other.

(Image: AFP/Getty Images)

(Image: X01882)

During the incident, back in August 2015, Lamar began to shout at Khloe very publicly.

Kris said of the day: "Khloe blames me, thinking that I told Lamar where she was gonna be, and that never happened. I know when Khloe sees this, it's gonna set her off again."

The pair first tied the knot in late 209, only a month after meeting.

Four years later, Lamar was arrested on charges of driving under the influence, and later that year Khloe filed for divorce.

Eventually, she made the claim that Lamar had been unfaithful.

"Let me tell something," she said at the time, "Last year, on my birthday, I lied to everyone, because I had to lie and sayI was with my husband, when in fact my husband was missing with another girl, OK?"
description: Khloe spoke with ex-husband Lamar on Keeping Up With The Kardashians after she heard he was penning a book
